00046 void RainbruRPG::Terminal::ListViewItem::addColumn(const char*c){
00047   columns.push_back(c);
00048 }
00049 
00057 const char* RainbruRPG::Terminal::ListViewItem::getColumn(unsigned int i){
00058   if (i>columns.size()){
00059     LOGW("Column number out of range");
00060     LOGCATS("getColumn parameter : ");
00061     LOGCATI(i);
00062     LOGCAT();
00063     return "";
00064   }
00065   else if(columns.empty()){
00066     LOGW("ListViewItem is empty");
00067     return "";
00068   }
00069   else{
00070     return columns[i];
00071   }
00072 }
00073 
00079 unsigned int RainbruRPG::Terminal::ListViewItem::columnCount(){
00080   return columns.size();
00081 }
